title: How to Sync a Hotmail Account on an iPhone: Complete Tutorial

steps.title: Open Settings.
steps.content: Open Settings. It's a gray app that contains gears (⚙️) and is typically located on your home screen.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Mail.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Mail . It's in the section of the menu that lists other Apple apps like Notes and Contacts.

steps.title: Tap Accounts.
steps.content: Tap Accounts . It's at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Add Account.
steps.content: Tap Add Account . It's at the bottom of the list of accounts.

steps.title: Tap Outlook.com.
steps.content: Tap Outlook.com . It's near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Enter your Hotmail email address.
steps.content: Enter your Hotmail email address. Type it in the field provided.

steps.title: Enter your password.
steps.content: Enter your password. Type the password associated with your Hotmail account into the field on the screen. If you haven't used your Hotmail account in a while, or you've forgotten your password, log into the Outlook.com website from your computer for help reactivating your account or resetting your password .

steps.title: Tap Sign In.
steps.content: Tap Sign In . It's the blue button on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Yes.
steps.content: Tap Yes . Doing so allows the Mail app to access your Hotmail account.

steps.title: Select the data to sync.
steps.content: Select the data to sync. Slide the buttons next to the listed apps to the "On" (green) position to sync your Hotmail data to your iPhone. You can sync: Mail Contacts Calendars Reminders Notes
